name: Pinewoods Paths Tuck Box
notes: Tuckbox for a retheme of Arboretum.
csv:
Blurb Description A meteor has struck Cottey House, flattening the woods nearby.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to replant the area with ten native plant species. Pinewoods Paths is a 30 minute card game for 2–4 players
ages 10 and up.
